Package xtc.lang.cpp

SuperC is a configuration-preserving preprocessor and parser for C.

See: Description

    This class's purpose is to provide the built-in macros and system includes.

Package xtc.lang.cpp Description

SuperC is a configuration-preserving preprocessor and parser for C.

Quick Start

First setup the environment variables: 
. xtc/src/xtc/lang/cpp/scripts/env.sh
Then run SuperC: 
java xtc.lang.cpp.SuperC file.c
Use -printAST to print the AST. Use -E to just do configuration-preserving preprocessing.

SuperC Technical Manual

Please read the SuperC technical manual packaged with the source code. 
cd java/src/xtc/lang/cpp

# Requires on pdflatex.
make manual.pdf
The manual's source is a latex file called manual.tex.
